current.html:
<style>
@font-face {
    font-family: 'haettenschweilerregular';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/hatten-webfont.woff2?v=1605814557') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/hatten-webfont.woff?v=1605814557') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'tex_gyre_adventorregular';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/texgyreadventor-regular-webfont.woff2?v=1605820241') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/texgyreadventor-regular-webfont.woff?v=1605820236') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}
@media only screen and (min-width: 769px) {
#shopify-section-1569932674319.index-section {
    margin:0 0 75px;
}
}

#shopify-section-1569932674319 .section-header {
background:url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0026/1829/4325/files/topsellers-min.jpg?v=1605902467');
       padding: 59px 30px;
    text-align: right;
}
#shopify-section-1569932674319 .section-header__title {
font-weight:bold;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'norwesterregular';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/norwester-webfont.woff2?v=1605900650') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0513/4476/9223/files/norwester-webfont.woff?v=1605900645') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}
.footer__newsletter-input {
border-color:#FAE60B;
}
.footer__title {
color:#FAE60B;
}
.footer__newsletter-btn .icon  {
color:#FAE60B;
}
</style>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Big+Shoulders+Display&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
